bio: Michael Puscar is the founder and CEO of Yuxi Pacific. He is a lifelong technology enthusiast and entrepreneur who built his 20‐year career in assisting publishing companies to leverage cutting edge technology that creates new products and new revenue using their existing content. Michael is the author of two U.S. patents, one approved and one pending, for automated content aggregation, semantic classification and extraction technology. He has a deep background working with search and retrieval technology, including metadata and entity extraction, automated content classification and data analytics.
name: Michael A. Puscar
